flawed_nl_solution:
Since each novel has 200 pages, you read 4*200 = <<4*200=800>>800 pages of novels every month.
Since a year has 12 months, you will read 800*12 = <<800*12=96000>>96000 pages in a year.
#### 96000

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 9600, not 96000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
